title: Bug 116786: Library include should store relative path.
description:
When including a library in a report design, the BIRT designer should generate and save a relative path. Currently, the absolute path is being stored. This causes issues when the project is moved or shared with other users.

Example:
1. Create a report design in $project/test.
2. Include a library in the report design.
3. Save the report design.
4. Close and reopen the report design.

Currently, the absolute path of the library is displayed instead of the relative path.
OB: The absolute path of the library is displayed in the report design.
EB: The relative path ($project/test/library_name) should be displayed in the report design.
SR:
1. Create a report design in $project/test.
2. Include a library in the report design.
3. Save the report design.
4. Close and reopen the report design.

Expected result: The library path should be displayed as a relative path ($project/test/library_name) instead of an absolute path.
